(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^scripts/config/templates/mime\.types$
^spec/fixtures/basic_auth/\.htpasswd$
^\.github/
